mapper.select: SELECT a.id as article_id, a.title, a.content, a.posted_date, t.id as tag_id, t.skill, t.image as tag_image FROM articles as a left join article_tags as at on at.article_id = a.id left join tags as t on at.tag_id = t.id ORDER BY a.id;
SELECT count(li.user_info_id) as likes_count FROM articles as a left join likes as li on li.article_id = a.id GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.id;
